title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
description: Two brothers use alchemy to try to bring their mother back to life, leading them on a journey to find the Philosopher's Stone.

title: My Hero Academia
description: In a world where nearly every human has a superpower, a powerless boy strives to become a hero.

title: Demon Slayer
description: A young boy fights demons to avenge his family and cure his sister, who has been turned into a demon.

title: One Piece
description: Monkey D. Luffy and his pirate crew seek the greatest treasure ever left by the legendary Pirate, Gold Roger.

title: Dragon Ball Z
description: The adventures of Goku and his friends as they defend the Earth from powerful enemies.

title: Death Note
description: A high school student discovers a supernatural notebook that allows him to kill anyone whose name he writes in it.

title: One Punch Man
description: A hero who can defeat any opponent with a single punch struggles with boredom and finding a real challenge.

title: Sword Art Online
description: Players of a virtual reality MMORPG find themselves trapped in the game, with death in the game meaning death in real life.

title: Tokyo Ghoul
description: A college student becomes a half-ghoul after a near-fatal encounter, and struggles with his new identity.

title: Neon Genesis Evangelion
description: A young pilot is recruited to defend humanity from mysterious beings called Angels using giant bio-mechanical robots.

title: Hunter x Hunter
description: A young boy embarks on a quest to find his missing father and become a Hunter.

title: Bleach
description: A teenager acquires the powers of a Soul Reaper to protect the world from evil spirits.

title: Fairy Tail
description: The adventures of Natsu Dragneel and his friends in the magical guild, Fairy Tail.

title: Cowboy Bebop
description: A group of bounty hunters travel the galaxy in search of dangerous criminals.

title: Steins;Gate
description: A group of friends discover time travel, but their actions create unintended consequences.

title: Your Name
description: Two teenagers swap bodies and try to meet each other in person while uncovering a mystery.

title: Spirited Away
description: A young girl is trapped in a mysterious, magical world and must find a way to escape.

title: Fruits Basket
description: A girl is taken in by a family cursed to turn into animals of the Chinese Zodiac.
